title: Adonis Recipe
full_text:
Adonis Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
dry sherry
1
ounce
sweet vermouth
1
dash
orange bitters
Orange twist
, to garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 seconds, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
